attributes.additional_details: This petition is for the UK Government to help the Palestinians and encourage freedom from any conflict. To protect the people of Palestine and ensure they are not harmed by Israeli Forces or any other Force. To help them live a good and decent life without fear, without discrimination and in democracy. Please sign this petition to do your part in helping raise awareness for those without a voice and bring humanity back to normality. This is every persons human right, why are the Palestinian people any different. Stand for Palestine.
